feedback: All acceptance criteria passed (15/15 tests). README.md is production-quality with 5929 bytes of comprehensive content. Code review approved with no blocking issues. iteration_history.summary: All acceptance criteria passed (15/15 tests) with no blocking issues. However, 3 should_fix reference errors must be resolved: (1) broken docs path references (docs/implementation-notes.md should be IMPLEMENTATION_NOTES.md, docs/performance.md should be PERFORMANCE.md), (2) broken LICENSE file reference, (3) GitHub URL placeholder needs actual repository URL. Quick iteration required to fix broken references before production deployment.
